sqlMap.select: select SC_ORG_ID, SUP_ORG_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_LVL_PATH, SC_ORG_NAME, SHORT_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC, NOTES, STATE from SC_ORG where SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into SC_ORG (SC_ORG_ID, SUP_ORG_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_LVL_PATH, SC_ORG_NAME, SHORT_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC, NOTES, STATE) values (#scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #supOrgId:DECIMAL#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, #orgLevel:DECIMAL#, #orgLvlPath:VARCHAR#, #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, #shortName:VARCHAR#, #lastName:VARCHAR#, #domainName:VARCHAR#, #domainNameSec:VARCHAR#, #notes:VARCHAR#, #state:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update SC_ORG set SUP_ORG_ID = #supOrgId:DECIMAL#, ORG_CODE = #orgCode:VARCHAR#, ORG_LEVEL = #orgLevel:DECIMAL#, ORG_LVL_PATH = #orgLvlPath:VARCHAR#, SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, SHORT_NAME = #shortName:VARCHAR#, LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#, DOMAIN_NAME = #domainName:VARCHAR#, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC = #domainNameSec:VARCHAR#, NOTES = #notes:VARCHAR#, STATE = #state:DECIMAL# where SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#

update SC_ORG
SUP_ORG_ID = #supOrgId:DECIMAL#
ORG_CODE = #orgCode:VARCHAR#
ORG_LEVEL = #orgLevel:DECIMAL#
ORG_LVL_PATH = #orgLvlPath:VARCHAR#
SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#
SHORT_NAME = #shortName:VARCHAR#
LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#
DOMAIN_NAME = #domainName:VARCHAR#
DOMAIN_NAME_SEC = #domainNameSec:VARCHAR#
NOTES = #notes:VARCHAR#
STATE = #state:DECIMAL#
where SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
